featured.text: 28 already shrunk by 85% to a mere 0.5 square kilometers, Papua’s glaciers will completely disappear within a decade, researchers have predicted.
A newly published study, however, revealed that rising temperatures are posing an 27 threat to the last tropical glaciers in Indonesia’s Papua region.
The study warned that Papua’s glaciers are only the “first to go” if greenhouse gases are 30 and temperatures continue rising.

definition.zh_def: 巴布亞，指位於西南太平洋的一個島嶼，主要包括巴布亞新幾內亞和印尼的巴布亞省。
definition.en_def: Papua refers to an island in the southwestern Pacific, primarily comprising Papua New Guinea and the Indonesian provinces of Papua.
definition.example: Papua is known for its rich biodiversity and unique cultures.
